name: Omanyte
description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
